{{cpp/ranges/lazy_split_view/title|base}}
{{cpp/ranges/lazy_split_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|1=
constexpr V base() const&amp; requires std::copy_constructible&lt;V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|1=
constexpr V base() &amp;&amp;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns a copy of the underlying view {{rlpsi|/#base_}}.

@1@ Copy constructs the result from the underlying view {{tti|base_}}.
@2@ Move constructs the result from the underlying view {{tti|base_}}.

===Return value===
A copy of the underlying view {{rlpsi|/#base_}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;
#include &lt;string_view&gt;

void print(std::string_view rem, auto const&amp; r, std::string_view post = "\n")
{
    for (std::cout &lt;&lt; rem; auto const&amp; e : r)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; e;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; post;
}

int main()
{
    constexpr std::string_view keywords{ "this,..throw,..true,..try,.." };
    constexpr std::string_view pattern{",.."};
    constexpr std::ranges::lazy_split_view lazy_split_view{keywords, pattern};
    print("base() = [", lazy_split_view.base(), "]\n"
          "substrings: ");
    for (auto const&amp; split: lazy_split_view)
        print("[", split, "] ");
}
|output=
base() = [this,..throw,..true,..try,..]
substrings: [this] [throw] [true] [try] []
}}
